lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Education of young people.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I help people in need and am especially motivated by those who are trying to help themselves.

lender.name: Dino
lender.loan_because: I can help, when ever I can, because people help me, I figure I can try to return the help.
lender.occupational_info: Shoe Sales, and Website designer,and amateur film producer.

lender.name: Roberto Guillen
lender.whereabouts: San Antonio de los Altos Miranda
lender.loan_because: I want people to be as lucky as I am. Everyone deserves to have a better standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: Engineering design

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: It feels good and I love the idea of ground-up support.

lender.name: ciro
lender.loan_because: its cool to help people
lender.occupational_info: contruction

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It's a good deed.
lender.occupational_info: Financial Officer

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and consider it a privilege to be part of a blessing for others.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I Can, One World ,One People
lender.occupational_info: I fix things

lender.name: Phyllis & Paul
lender.loan_because: we can.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: a rising tide lifts all boats.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.occupation: Work for Thayne Center for Service & Learning
lender.loan_because: I have students doing projects on micro loans. I have been impressed with their projects and wanted to be a part of the solution. the first step was easy as my friends Barb and Chris gave me a GC to Kiva. org. I hope to keep this money gving and add some more ot it.
lender.occupational_info: I help studnets see how volunteering can help them in thier educational journey. It can help them find themselves, find a true life goal, help with scholarships, and getting into difficult programs. i love my job. My experience comes from years of volunteering with non-profits and discovering my talents and how much I get from giving to others.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I applaud anyone who starts / has their own business, and I'd like to help if I can.

lender.name: Victor
lender.loan_because: The best we can do in life is help others. The greatest satisfaction is knowing somebody will keep on going with your little help.
lender.occupational_info: In my job, we help people and businesses to achieve goals by installing or modifying working procedures, creating new systems.

lender.name: wayne
lender.loan_because: I believe strongly in free markets and micro-lending as the best way to support raising the standard of living in underdeveloped countries. I also have an emphatic commitment to philanthropy.
lender.occupational_info: retired railroad legislative advocate of transportation issues. I lobbied both Congress and the California, Nevada and Utah Legislatures.

lender.name: MVC
lender.loan_because: we are blessed and we that we can.

lender.name: Sami
lender.loan_because: i like to do nice things, and this is nice.
lender.occupational_info: i read and write theories about language, but to pay the bills, i work in a library.

lender.name: Ues Comunicaciones S.A.
lender.loan_because: Creemos firmemente en el emprendimiento y sabemos que cuando las oportunidades son bien aprovechadas generan grandes cambios.

lender.name: Stefan & Jolene Lundgren
lender.loan_because: We want to try to help

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: It's not changing the world, it's helping one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization dedicated to eliminating injuries and deaths among workers who harvest timber in British Columbia, Canada.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I do realize how even a little amount of money can really change someone's life. Inspired by numerous success stories, I firmly believe that the money I provide can help boost the entrepreneurial spirit, and overall economic development, in third-world countries.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.occupational_info: I create programs to run on computers.

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because: With Kiva I know where my money goes. I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I run IT-projects and support users of the application I work with.

lender.name: Shari
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do:)
lender.occupational_info: I am a police officer in a small community. I enjoy my job as it gives me the opportunity to help others in need.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: If I can help someone to start their own business and earn their living by lending them money then I will gladly do that.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Stockholm, Sweden in a small technical firm with sales and marketing of CAD related products to architects and engineers.

lender.name: sarah
lender.loan_because: It's important to help when you are able to. I could spend this much on my morning coffee in a month. That money may change someone's life.

lender.name: Cayetano Castro
lender.loan_because: Cayetano was proud of his Dominican heritage. Although he resided in the US, he wanted to make it a better place for those who remain. I loan to women in the DR in his memory.

lender.name: Nolene
lender.loan_because: I feel connected to people all over the world and it reminds me how lucky i am and how little it takes to make a difference in someone elses life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in intensive care taking care of sick patients often close to death. I feel honored to be able to help and humbled to be involved in this major events in thier lives.

lender.name: Mayr
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Michael Goodban
lender.loan_because: I think it's a fantastic cause, and I don't feel I'm losing anything.
lender.occupational_info: Serve food and beverages to people.

lender.name: Milena
lender.loan_because: I need to help others in order to improve the world and end suffering.
lender.occupational_info: I design many product for little girls and teenagers

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: The lord has blessed me and I need to give back so that i may keep what I have. It is said that we must help our brother, and who is our brother or sister.... those who need our help. I am only managing the gifts God has given me to be stewart over.
lender.occupational_info: A servant to the lord and I happen to work in a warehouse also.

lender.name: Collette
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help these folks expand there horizons.

lender.name: amy
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great idea and love playing a small part in empowering others.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: God has given me and my family so much. I want to honor the gifts by sharing with those who are trying to make a better life for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school students how to become entrepreneurs and start businesses.

lender.name: Alisha & Pierre
lender.loan_because: Sometimes hard work just isn't enough. As a business owner myself, I understand how even a small boost from the outside can make a difference.

lender.name: kathy
lender.loan_because: People with the drive and ambition to start a business deserve a helping hand. I have been blessed in my life and want to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: Healthcare

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing others fulfill a dream of working for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am an esthetician.

lender.name: Rosalyn
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful opportunity to help others in need. "Money is like manure, it does no good unless you spread it around encouraging things to grow" -Hello Dolly
lender.occupational_info: I work at a University encouraging advanced education and learning.

lender.name: jeff
lender.loan_because: I want to help others

lender.name: Barry & Sandy
lender.loan_because: I have chosen to loan money to Hispanic families since the school at which I teach, is primarily children of Mexican families. I have come to know many of these families and respect the long hours and hard work that they do in order to support their families. Our family is blessed, and must never take for granted what we have. I hope this will be the beginning of a long and successful loan program with this organization.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I are both teachers at elementary schools in the Atlanta, Georgia, USA metro area.

lender.name: joey
lender.loan_because: It's way to give another mother, a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I am seemstress and a single mother. I sew items for boats.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I want people to help people realize their dreams. I don't mind helping people who are willing to work hard, and help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I do engineering for roads and bridges. It is my responsiblity to lay out all parts of the job, and make sure it is built to the plans.

lender.name: Keva
lender.loan_because: Because I am a single parent also and understand the struggle.

lender.name: Prudy
lender.loan_because: I can. I owe a ton of money since divorcing but can still get by. I know that is what matters, being with your children and having a home.
lender.occupational_info: I work when my kids are in school or with their father. I manage the money that goes in and out of a small woman owned business.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: These women who are need of that extra boost, that work hard, deserve to be given a chance! Good Luck!!!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small but successful hair salon. I help them look their best. My parents helped me get started...and I thrived because they believed in me!

lender.name: Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: Well, I don't have much extra money to help others, but I feel it is inportant to try and help where i can and when I can. This is a great opportunity for me to be able to do a small part on behalf of my family and myself to help in a small way to another family that may be in need more than we are.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a deli in Walmart , which is pretty much a good company that does help in contributing to very good causes around the country.

lender.name: elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone needs a little help to make a big differance.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sales person for a large global company. i sell software that helps companines run their business.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving individuals the tools they need to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I help students find information and books for their school projects and assignments at a university.

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: In a small way I would like to participate in helping people improve their lives
lender.occupational_info: I help patient who have a chronic or live limiting diagnosis maanage their pain and other symptoms.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: It's a great value for the investment and offers immense satisfaction.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Through hard work and good luck I have been blessed with more than my fair share of the worldly wealth. This is my way of sharing my good fortune with people in need.

lender.name: Lea
lender.loan_because: I believe that women should have the same opportunities as men in building a solid business. Additional support is needed to make this happen.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large, global software company; I sell "solutions" to my customers to help them provide better services to their customers.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I've had people help me through some tough times, and I want to be able to help others in need too.
lender.occupational_info: Helping patients in the hospital meet their dietary needs.

lender.name: tracie
lender.loan_because: My sister gave me a loan to start up my own business and to be able to help someone else in need to improve their life-How could I not give back!
lender.occupational_info: I own a doggie day care. We provide playgroups, boarding and grooming.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: There is a need.

lender.name: liz
lender.loan_because: In my country ,I am considered 'poor' . I am self employed and partly disabled . { no gvmnt help } I have traveled to central America and seen how far my dollar can go . I am happy to help another woman working hard to make her and her family a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I sew anything for boats . Tops , covers , cushions , and upholstery.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I love to travel. In the last two years I have been in Peru, Brazil and India. The poverty is eye-opening and at the same time difficult to comprehend for those of us who live so well in the US or other Western countries. If my loans mean a better life for these new friends, then I don't even care if they pay it back.

lender.name: anne
lender.occupational_info: A believer in dreams.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. I especially want to see a fellow telecommunications special succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a telecommunications specialist that project manages the installation of large bandwidth around the world.

lender.name: JUDITH
lender.occupation: DIRECTOR OF CHILDRENS SERVICES FOR NON PROFIT

lender.name: jacqui
lender.loan_because: I have been looking for a worthwhile cause that I truly believed would make a difference in the hopes and dreams for somebody else.

lender.name: Barney
lender.loan_because: We are all one family of man.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching is very challeging and rewarding. It is one of the earliest endeavors of mankind and it changes as society changes.

lender.name: Alan and Becky
lender.occupational_info: Alan preserves and cares for artwork in a museum. Becky is an artist and teaches art to children.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I would like to help women who are in need. It feels like a very small effort with a much bigger result for someone who really needs help.
lender.occupational_info: I sold a retail clothing store and an ecommerce website. I have been retired for over a year and spend a lot of time with my daughters (21 nd 26), my husband Alan and my doggie Joey!

lender.name: Mick
lender.loan_because:
"They who say that we should love our fellow citizens but not foreigners, destroy the universal brotherhood of mankind, without which benevolence and justice would perish forever." Cicero
"Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could do only a little." Edmund Burke

lender.name: Amelia
lender.loan_because: I believe this is an excellent program, which allows people to work for a better way of life.
lender.occupational_info: Community development, social work, cultural competancy training, grant writing, program management and design .

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: I am so grateful for life I have, and the ability to raise my child with love, peace, and plenty...I would like to pass along the generosity I have received from others in the course of my life.

lender.name: Debie
lender.loan_because: If I had not had someone give me new chances, I don't know where I'd be right now. God has blessed me and my family in many ways. I hope I can help bless others ...
lender.occupational_info: This is a picture of my son, daughter, me and my dad. My dad and my kids are my hero's!

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed with my life and wish to share some of my good fortune, and I am inspired by the ambition and determination of others whose lives are substantially more difficult than my own.
lender.occupational_info: I sell and support software developed by our own programmer.

lender.name: deborah
lender.occupation: Dept of Public Health Program Director
lender.loan_because: there are no boundaries in the world anymore. The impact of poverty on one person affects us all. The impact of OPPORTUNITY on one person also affects us all!
lender.occupational_info: I direct an injury prevention and control program and see the effects of poverty, and opportunity, on children.

lender.name: alan & diana
lender.loan_because: IT IS THE RIGHT THING TO DO.
lender.occupational_info: MY WIFE IS A MASTER CARPENTER. I AM A RETIRED CHEF.WE LOVE TO WORK WITH PEOPLE.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: it is my way of ministering hope. I sense hope in the lives of these people.
lender.occupational_info: Community Action Center Volunteer

lender.name: Ben & Abigael
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can and it's right.
lender.occupational_info: Abby is a Music Librarian for one of the largest public library systems in the United States and an early music singer. I am a licensed bodyworker for an international day spa and a private instructor.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe great changes can be made one small step at a time.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I know that it takes a lot of support to make a business work, whether it be a friend, family or just someone that believes in you, makes all the difference in the world!
lender.occupational_info: I've justed started two new businesses, one helping peope find a place they can call home and also helping people find affordable healthcare or a home based business

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: Because my life is so blessed and I want to pass it on.

lender.name: John & Deb
lender.loan_because: We have the ability and want to help those in need.

lender.name: Cornita
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others. Helping small businesses in their quest to succeed has a greater impact in that individuals, families and communities reap the benefits as well.
lender.occupational_info: My job focuses on helping persons in need of assistance in handling real estate matters.

lender.name: Davida
lender.loan_because: I can, and I should. There was a time I could have used the help. And now that I can help, I will.
lender.occupational_info: Coordinate the utilization of outside companies to supplement our business needs. Both nationally and internationally.

lender.name: Don & Sue
lender.loan_because: Because we can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired Architect while my wife will retire soon.

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupational_info: I teach general classroom music at a public elementary school. My students are ages 6 through 11. In my classroom we sing, dance, play instruments and learn about cultures around the world.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: A friend of mine, Carrie Dulin taught me about giving to other people by dedicating her whole life, and ultimately her life, to KIVA's principals.

lender.name: Felipe
lender.loan_because: once someone gave me a chance, and now I would like to give back.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference

lender.name: Catherine McCaffrey
lender.loan_because: I can't go to them. I want to make a difference in the lives of people who need a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I give to more than a dozen charities regularly - but none as satisfying as loaning my money to women I'll never see. We (United Methodist Women) are having a book study on Half the Sky soon. I plan to do a display of the women who have used my money. I just studied Chang the World with a group. I am praying that people at our church will begin contributing to Kiva this year.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: people need to feel empowered.

lender.name: Walt Barrett
lender.occupation: President of China Depot / A to Z Global Marketing
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate and wish to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I own a very successful import-export business, www.chinadepot.com, and have also started a business building micro homes that run totally by solar and are off the power grid. I started my Internet business in 1995 with only a $1000.00 investment to buy a computer and get on the Internet. I plan on at least one loan a month. I also build solar water pumping systems for underdeveloped areas. I am also a writer, photographer, and film maker.

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: I know how lucky I am to live where I do. I want to see others achieve their dreams and if I can help by participating in Kiva then why shouldn't we all. Think of the potential.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Chef for a large Theme park resort in Florida. I oversee food operations in a luxury resort hotel. I feed tourists on vacations.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: The interest returned on this $25 is far more valuable than the % from a bank, etc.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a sales team for a leading company in IP Test.

lender.name: Bill and Arlene
lender.loan_because: Our motto is "everyone should have one house before someone gets two." There should be an equalizing of assets throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: Bill:sourdough bread factory supervisor. Arlene: Factory helper. Each day 40,000 loaves of bread are made and distributed throughout our area in stores and farmer markets. All the bread is all natural.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a major logistics and transportation company.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are in need. Others don't have the luck or priviliges that I've had.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Spanish to 7th and 8th grade students.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want to help women in the world who are in the business world
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell their homes

lender.name: Carmen & John (& Trot)
lender.loan_because: This is an incredible opportunity to help someone in a tangible way. We're happy to be part of this process...

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur and I'm so excited to be able to support people in their unique quests, rather than contribute to a faceless organization. It's a great thrill and privilege to be able to make an impact without needing large sums of donation money to do it!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a lifelong editor and writer specializing in marketing. In my own work, I'm looking for entrepreneurial ideas that could work as businesses for poor women, especially in third world countries. I'd like to help more women and children lift themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: Roxanne
lender.loan_because: it is what the universe expects of us
lender.occupational_info: I teach the story of the United States to 17 year old young adults

lender.name: Jo
lender.loan_because: I want to help give people a "leg up" so they can have a better life.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I can make a small difference
lender.occupational_info: I am a trumpet player and recording engineer.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: You gotta spend money to make money! I know how hard it can be to get a loan and I love the idea of P2P lending.
lender.occupational_info: Retail

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: It's a small amount of money, that can mean so much to someone else. I want to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school Geometry. That's a mathematics course that deals with shapes and angles.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: My ancestors came from eastern Europe and I have been on several medical mission trips to third world countries. I realize how much can be done with what to us seems like a small amount of money.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a nurse for 42 years. I have been at the University of WI hospital and clinics for almost 20 years.

lender.name: audrey
lender.loan_because: i ve been helped by others so i want to pass that help on.

lender.name: Donna
lender.occupation: Graduate student/ single Mom of 2 college students
lender.loan_because: I care and I believe in these women- I know the struggles and I know the determination they feel as they work against a society that holds them back.

lender.name: Betsi
lender.occupational_info: generate / review / analyze/ negotiate contracts

lender.name: KS _Meadowlark
lender.loan_because: It is important to educate and provide opportunities for women to earn a living to support their families and children. Educated women are the only means for people to get out of poverty.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: I like to think that participating in Kiva is a small step in helping motivated small business men and women across the world become succesful.
lender.occupational_info: I write protocols for the treatment of cancer in our network of 600+ doctors in the community setting across the United States. Once the studies are completed, I write the presentations and publications from the study data.

lender.name: Diane and Stephen
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed in life and are happy to have this chance to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Diane is a retired school teacher. Stephen is retired from a refinery laboratory.

lender.name: Ponda
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jim
lender.occupational_info: According to my daughter, "Architects help people build houses so people can be happy. They can build offices so people can go to work there".

lender.name: Angela Corinne
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help make a difference directly and now through KIVA I have found a way!

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I understand how difficult it is to be a female business owner and have been blessed with my success, it's time to pass that on to other women.
lender.occupational_info: I am the owner of The Scented Garden in St Michaels Maryland. I admire women who have the courage to open their own businesses.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with the ability to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a local financial firm providing computer and software support to the associates.

lender.name: UncleBob
lender.loan_because: Helping Others
lender.occupational_info: Medical

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I love this idea. There have been times in my life when only the faith and action of others has sustained me. I owe my planet and it's people, don't we all?

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I like to know to whom, and to where, money I donate is going and Kiva provides that.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and am going to use this as a class project for some of my students

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to help others have a better life, and it was so easy to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired school teacher. Although I loved teaching for 35 years, I now enjoy being a homemaker and full-time grandmother.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: There is a need and I can.

lender.name: Lynn & Al
lender.loan_because: we are able.

lender.name: Virginia & Aaron
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: No one can do it all alone.

lender.name: Kimberly and Alex
lender.loan_because: I have served in a foreign country for 2 years and this is my way of giving back a little of what i learned from them.
lender.occupational_info: I see patients and prescribe drugs to help people get well.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I believe in offering a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: Bookkeeper for a non-profit organization.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed. Maybe I can help someone have a better life. A hand up is much better than a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: Cross country truck driver with my husband, Patrick.

lender.name: Tracie
lender.loan_because: I think this is an incredible way to actually help people. Instead of just giving with the hope of it being helpful, you actually get to see the person you're helping! I think it makes the world a much smaller place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher. I work with children who are learning disabled. I absolutely love my job! It's a joy to see children learn everyday.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I understand the struggles that entrepreneurs face when trying to increase their business with limited resources.
lender.occupational_info: I sell cell phones and activate service with major service providers. I also resell mailboxes on a server to allow small businesses the opportunity to enjoy the benefits of a server without having to buy one. Additionally, I offer after-sale support with the higher end phones (PDA and Smartphones)

lender.name: Amber
lender.occupational_info: Social Work manager at a clinic for HIV/AIDS.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need. These folks need more than they have. It just makes sense!

lender.name: Mandy and Abigail
lender.loan_because: I feel a responsibility to help where I can. This is a great way to have a direct impact on another person's life. I want to share the importance of helping another human being with my daughter. I want her to learn by example and teach her that all humans are interdependent.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to 15 and 16 year old students. I teach writing, grammar, and world literature.

lender.name: SHIRLEY A
lender.loan_because: I just want to give others a chance in life to better their life and also what I am doing is what the Lord would want me to do, plus makes me feel good that I am helping .
lender.occupational_info: I am a jack of all trades,master of none. You are my sister and brother no matter where you live, I am a follower of Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Karl & Dana
lender.loan_because: We believe it is important to help and recognize those who help themselves and there families.
lender.occupational_info: I help Clients reduce their Fleet costs and maximize production.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: We can all make a difference- one small action at a time. We are all connected so...How could I not want to be a part of that? :)
lender.occupational_info: I use my hands to massage and do hands on energy healing to help people who are in pain have less pain.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: Providing a helping hand from another along the path of life's journey.
lender.occupational_info: I provide instructions that make a computer perform useful tasks.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can afford it and I have the ability to take and pay back loans myself. It allows me to improve my family's life, and I'm sure it will benefit those that I extend to as well.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I run approximately 20 angus-maine anjou cows on a small farm in east-central Iowa. We also work at jobs in town

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: it is a way for ordinary people to help change other people's lives in an extraordinary way.
lender.occupational_info: This is my 35th year as a teacher. Mostly I've worked with 5th graders, and that has blessed me with many happy experiences and memories. My job is not about the paperwork that is required, but about the learning. Learning is what really matters.

lender.name: Bette
lender.loan_because: My life is good. I want to help others achieve a better life through supporting their efforts.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I've been given so much. I'm fortunate I have a beautiful house, dogs and I am able to go to school and not have to work. If $25 can help some one, I can give up eating out one time a week to help someone who is stuggling to make ends meet.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student.

lender.name: kwok
lender.loan_because: I like to help others in anyway that I can.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can to help.
lender.occupational_info: We plant, grow and harvest corn and soybeans.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I'd like to give other a jump start at opportunity and success. A small loan oftentimes is the difference between success and failure.
lender.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse who works at a local clinic in a rural community.

lender.name: Christ In Motion
lender.loan_because: It is an opportunity to help others and become a channel of God's Love

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: It's such a small thing to do, yet it can make such a huge difference in another's life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach classes to college students.

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.occupational_info: I work for an international humanitarian organization focused on helping children and communities. I was based in Asia for two years and am now based in the US again.

lender.name: charlotte
lender.loan_because: i saw the information on the Today Show this morning and felt compelled to help others in need
lender.occupational_info: i make jewelry with my husband and sell it at craft shows and my online store. as someone who is an entrepreneur myself, it was important to share with others.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because:
I am grateful for the blessings in my life; the least I can do is offer a helping hand to others.
Think of giving not as a duty but as a privilege. - John D. Rockefeller Jr.
Money is like manure; it's not worth a thing unless it's spread around encouraging young things to grow. - Thornton Wilder from "The Matchmaker

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: I'm thankfut that I have 5 healthy children and I'm able to stay home to care for them.

lender.name: Dick
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in peoples lives
lender.occupational_info: I sell bolting tools used in heavy equipment and industry.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I feel connected and responsible to the world!
lender.occupational_info: I work with the Physical Therapist to treat all kinds of patients, and help them do the things they used to do before their injury or sickness.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference and teach my children to lend a hand to someone who may not have the opportunities that we do.
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineer for a government agency.

lender.name: Crystal & Tim
lender.loan_because: My husband and I know what it is to start own business and how important a loan can be to make a business work.
lender.occupational_info: We are a Cell phone Retailer for Sprint and Nextel. We sell and repair sprint and Nextel Cellular Phones

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: I have a strong regard for those who support themselves and family through business enterprises. This also gives me an opportunity to offer assistance on a more personal level to people in areas of the world I've yet to visit.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee a business that provides medical care for animals.

lender.name: Butch
lender.occupation: Web Design / Wearer of many hats
lender.loan_because: It just seems like a great idea! A small low-risk investment, that can help so much. I have been a small business owner, so I can understand how a small loan can help a lot. It feels great to help make a differance.
lender.occupational_info: I design websites, and I do many other things, mostly with computers.

lender.name: Maura
lender.loan_because: I can relate to someone running their own business and needing help to grow that business.
lender.occupational_info: I had an idea and created a product which I sell wholesale to stores across the US and Canada.

lender.name: 'neta
lender.loan_because: In memory of my mom who wanted to help folks striving in hard times, and my dad who let not the left hand knoweth. Personal blessings inspire me in hope that a loan may be a blessing for another.
lender.occupational_info: I have a business consulting practice and teach business management classes at the university level.

lender.name: Kelley
lender.loan_because: I had my own business for a while, and it was very difficult getting started. I want to help empower women so they can sustain themselves and thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Registered Nurse at a University and I'm studying to be a Nurse Practitioner.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I microscopically screen for cancer, primarily for cervical cancer (pap smears0.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I like to know that I can help someone else fulfill their dreams in a practical way.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I admire people to try to succeed in their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired Special Education Teacher. Now I have a home based business as a Creative Memories Consultant. I help people preserve their photos & stories in beautiful albums.

lender.name: Vickie
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: ...because it is all good. God provides for us so we can provide for others. I recently lost my job but want to support others however I can.

lender.name: Scott & Jean
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: It is a good thing to do

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: It's a great opportunity to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: My business is a small concrete construction business. We do footings, foundations, walls, driveways, floors, sidewalks, curb & gutter work etc.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I think this is an excellent way for people such as myself who are unable to make large donations to make a difference for many people and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I assist our client employers with their employee benefits, such as health insurance.

lender.name: Audrey
lender.loan_because: It takes all of us to make a difference!!

lender.name: Troy & Kelli Van Houten
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed in the United States. It's clearly the right thing to do - helping those who do not have financial resources like we do.
lender.occupational_info: The Company I work for (Micron Technology) manufactures computer chips that fuel the most advanced digital products - revolutionizing the way your applications capture, move, and store information.

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: small business owners everywhere face a multitude of challenges and this is a way I can help answer one of them.
lender.occupational_info: I keep the books for my husband's businesses.

lender.name: Rex & Dianne
lender.loan_because: We should always be willing to help others

lender.name: Tami
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping others who are helping themselves rather than just always handing out money. It gives one a sense of pride to know they are earning their own business.
lender.occupational_info: when someone sees the doctor, the doctor make notes for the patient's medical record. I listen to the doctor's recorded notes and type them up for the medical record.

lender.name: Summer
lender.occupation: Mother of two, and Technical Records Specialist

lender.name: Audree
lender.loan_because: 1. Impact - One can impact another's life in a profound way. 2. Global - One can reach across boarders 3. Variety - Great to see the variety of opportunities
lender.occupational_info: I help build buildings by writing contracts, watching budgets, and supporting the people in the field that get all dirty and sweaty.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs some help along the way. I'd like to think this small thing can make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I used to sit at a desk all day, in front of a computer, and solve problems. I quit that after 20+ years. Now I do alterations/mending. I spend a lot of my free time reading, painting and keeping up with politics.

lender.name: Sandi
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me in my business and I want to help others to be successful as well....
lender.occupational_info: I have an in-home business where I help others create and maintain their own businesses in the health and wellness industry.

lender.name: MARGARET
lender.occupation: I am a wife, mother, and grandmother.
lender.loan_because: I love people and think it is wonderful when others are trying to improve their life and business.
lender.occupational_info: I use to work for a bank but now I am enjoying life and my grandchildren.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: people have been good to me. I am very blessed and thankful.
lender.occupational_info: I teach fourth and fifth grade language arts and social studies

lender.name: jas
lender.loan_because: I want to add what I can to someone else's endeavors.
lender.occupational_info: retired. like to garden flowers - mainly day lilies.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: I believe we can only improve our world if we add up everyone's individual effort!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a venture capital firm vesting start up's projects in Spain

lender.name: Kathrine
lender.loan_because: It is a small thing I can do to have a positive influence in the life of another human being.
lender.occupational_info: I run the office of our small construction company and I work for a home health organization as the HIM coordinator.

lender.name: Ginger & Milton
lender.loan_because: we think this is a great way to help people break the bonds of poverty
lender.occupational_info:
Ginger -- I'm a minister in the United Church of Christ
Milton -- I'm a teacher in a small high school

lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: If you can be a blessing to someone in need, why wouldn't you?

lender.name: linda
lender.loan_because: I think it is good to help others to help themselves.

lender.name: rachell
lender.loan_because: LIVING IS GIVING!!
lender.occupational_info:
AUTOMOBILE INDUSTRAY
We build Nissan automobiles.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help women in other countries who are trying to make it on their own in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office handling bills that need to be paid, preparing letters for my employer, answering the telephone, preparing & handling bank deposits, and in general, doing anything that needs to be done in an office.

lender.name: richik
lender.occupational_info: i have a small system integration company of my own.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to have a positive impact.
lender.occupational_info: In 2005, I decided to become an entrepreneur so I could spend more time with my family. My Business provides information and services to the Payments Industry.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: it's a good thing to do. Living in the US with as many luxuries as we have, I think it is our responsibility to help others. The amount of these loans is so small and yet they can change lives. I think about how much money is spent eating out or going to movies and such and if that activity can be skipped a few times, the money can to these loans and it really doesn't present any hardship to me in any way.
lender.occupational_info: I own and in-home pet sitting business. My customers are generally well off and my service is a luxury.

lender.name: CMD
lender.loan_because: I care and I can!

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I can and it makes a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I import and distribute handmade greeting cards from South Africa and give the proceeds to our 501(c)3 which helps to educate young girls in Namibia.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: No matter where you lay your head at the end of the day, no matter what God you might pray to, we are all brothers and sisters.
lender.occupational_info: I direct an employment program that helps people with disabilities and other difficulties find work.

lender.name: Ann & Sandi
lender.loan_because: Kiva gives us access to those in need and it gives individuals an opportunity to improve their lives.

lender.name: Joy-Dawn
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I can and it is the right thing to do. It is a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I am a director of school programs for children with disabilities.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: I believe God works many miracles, large and small, and it is our responsibility to help when we can.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I really want to help others and have the world work better.

lender.name: Curt
lender.loan_because: As others have helped me along the way, I want to help boost others to have a better lives.

lender.name: Sheri
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those who work to help themselves, those who are not looking for a handout.

lender.name: KAREN
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed just to be living in America with all the freedoms and opportunities we enjoy. Kiva provides a mechanism for helping improve the lives of others around the world. Thanks, Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I have worked for the Federal government for 40 years. I am a Contracting Officer and purchase goods and services for my Federal agency.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: There is no separation, we are all one.
lender.occupational_info: I build web sites on the Internet and use them to make money in various ways.

lender.name: Maura
lender.loan_because: Others have helped me. It's time to pass it along.
lender.occupational_info: My work is similar to a city manager; I operate a Tribal government and Native American Indian Reservation.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I had nothing to do with where I was born and how fortunate I am because of that. I can, however, have something to do with easing the struggles of others who were born into less fortunate circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I help others to understand products and materials that are more sustainable to use in their homes, which is not only healthier for them, but the environment as well.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person. ~ Mother Teresa

lender.name: Liz and Deb
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: So much has been given to me. Kiva gives me the opportunity to make a difference for one person. "All I can do is add my light to the sum of light."
lender.occupational_info: my days are spent at the intersection of medical device design, people, and technology.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with legal problems.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: Kiva helps me make a difference in my own small way. Person to person giving makes sense to me.
lender.occupational_info: I was a teacher for 34 years before retiring.

lender.name: RUBY
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I train people to become teachers to young children. In other words, I work in an Educational Program.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: You can't beat the drum of what's going wrong and let in what is right! - Abraham-Hicks
lender.occupational_info: As a human being, I am learning from teachers and in turn, teaching others about caring for and supporting individuals in the world that have had less opportunities than myself. I believe it takes all of us as human beings, working together in support of real causes with open hearts and love for those seeking to better themselves.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a cow!!

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I should.
lender.occupational_info: I represent battered women and children with the goal of empowerment and self-sufficiency for abused families.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: Frankly because it is so easy and I think these loans help individuals. I should be physically out there building homes with Habitat but can't seem to make the time or effort. This charity assuages my guilt. I will lend more and urge my business associates to do the same.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I can. Freely I have received; now it's time to freely give.
lender.occupational_info: I remind people that Jesus especially cared for the least, the last, and the lost. I believe we are called do the same today.

lender.name: Rusyl Lynn
lender.loan_because: at some point in our life, we will need a helping hand; and by helping one another, we establish a little more sense of well-being.

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Linae
lender.loan_because: I have been extremely blessed to have been loaned money to obtain an education to have my career. I feel it's important to support one another. This is a wonderful opportunity to give to others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to keep their teeth healthy.

lender.name: judy
lender.loan_because: I understand what it is like to start over, need help, and not know how to get it.
lender.occupational_info: I teach sixth grade students at a public school in Arizona.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: It's one way I can give back for all the help I have received over the years. I am loaning to Yuliya because my own family is from Ukraine.
lender.occupational_info: I am going to school to become a teacher.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I believe in people
lender.occupational_info: I love to troubleshoot electro/mechanical problems

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I enjoy philanthropy and travel. I am interested in helping people who are honest and hardworking, but were not born in a country of such great opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I sell real estate in Coeur d'Alene, Idaho - a picturesque town with an abundance of lakes, rivers, mountains and kind and friendly people.

lender.name: Crystal
lender.loan_because: It's my way of helping people make their dreams come to fruition.

lender.name: Ginger
lender.loan_because: Makes me smile and feels so good.
lender.occupational_info: A lifetime of "playing" with all things old and interesting.

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: I have traveled and worked in other countries. I also speak French fluently. Kiva is an excellent program.
lender.occupational_info: Provide renewable energy products and services.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I am blessed, and I would like to be a blessing to others.

lender.name: Sharon & Jim
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed and I feel I should help people less fortunate that they may have a better life.

lender.name: Mari
lender.loan_because: I'm a single mom of three, who works hard to make ends meet, I guess you could say, "I totally understand these women and men trying to make ends meet in their end of the world"...We're all tied together in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in charge of purchasing school supplies and materials for the 9600 students in my school district (pencils, pens, paper, books, equipment, computers etc)

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: $25 is such a small amount and can do so much good. I waste that amount every week on nothing.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in a career that was based on helping people help themselves. The Kiva concept continues that.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: It funds a hard working individual who may not have the same resources as I do in my country and I feel that my help can really make a impact.
lender.occupational_info: I work early in the morning at a business that answers calls for people who need help with their vehicle and send people to help them. I do this so I can pickup my daughter after school on time.

lender.name: Amy and Eric
lender.loan_because: It's good karma. It makes us feel good to help fellow entrepreneurs make it in their business.
lender.occupational_info: Crazy entertainment such as clowning, mime, face painting, balloon sculpting, bellydance, drumming, fire eating, fortune telling, singing telegrams, henna art, living statues, etc.
